radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is diffusely echogenic with focal fatty sparing near the gallbladder fossa. A focal hypoechoic lesion is seen in the left lobe of the liver near the dome, measuring 1.4 x 1.2 cm, with slightly heterogeneous internal echotexture and internal flow. No ascites; cholelithiasis without gallbladder wall thickening.
